Item ID4778

Iron brutal arrows are used to kill Zogres south of the Castle Wars arena. They are made with flighted ogre arrows and iron nails. Level 18 Fletching is required to make these and they yield 2.6 experience per arrow. They can only be used with a Composite ogre bow.

[[File:Iron brutal detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Iron brutal arrows''' are used to kill [[Zogre]]s south of the [[Castle Wars]] arena. They are made with [[flighted ogre arrow]]s and [[iron nails]]. Level 18 [[Fletching]] is required to make these and they yield 2.6 [[experience]] per arrow. They can only be used with a [[Composite ogre bow]].
